law.catch_line: The president of the county board is entitled to receive $4,000 annually as compensation and the oth...

text.section: The president of the county board is entitled to receive $4,000 annually as compensation and the other voting members each are entitled to receive $3,500 annually as compensation.
The president of the county board and other members each are entitled to reimbursement not to exceed $1,000 a year for travel and other expenses.
The Queen Anne's County Commissioners may increase the annual salary of the county board.
